snippet: The top of the men's game has been set in stone for a decade with first Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal, then joined by Novak Djokovic and Andy Murray dominating the top of the ATP rankings....
lead_paragraph: The top of the men's game has been set in stone for a decade with first Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal, then joined by Novak Djokovic and Andy Murray dominating the top of the ATP rankings.

headline.print_headline: Factbox: The Young Lions to Watch This Year
headline.main: Factbox: The Young Lions to Watch This Year
